definition: the act of designating or identifying something
details:
noun
- the act of designating or identifying something
= synonyms: designation
- the attribution to yourself (consciously or unconsciously) of the characteristics of another person (or group of persons)
- the process of recognizing something or someone by remembering
= synonyms: recognition
- evidence of identity
- the condition of having the identity established
= example: the condition of having the identity established
